insights.populationGrowth: Rapid growth 2.3% driven by border trade with India and industrial development.
insights.educationLevel: Good 85% literacy due to cross-border commerce and development.
insights.employmentPattern: Border trade 35%, industry 25%, agriculture 25%, services 12%, government 3%.
insights.housingPattern: Modern houses 45%, traditional houses 35%, commercial buildings 20%.

insights.temperature: Subtropical climate, warm winters (15°C), hot summers (35°C). Border plains location.
insights.precipitation: Very high 2,800mm with intense monsoons and flooding risks.
insights.seasonality: Warm winter, hot pre-monsoon, intense monsoon flooding, humid post-monsoon.
insights.extremeEvents: Severe monsoon flooding, waterlogging, infrastructure damage, cross-border impacts.

recentDisasters.impact: Border trade halted, major infrastructure damage

preparedness.reliefCapacity: Medium - Border infrastructure but extreme flood risks

economicProfile.businessEnvironment: Major India-Bhutan trade gateway, industrial development, flood risk management critical
